input.sentences: it was a beautiful day all around .
they wondered what was on the other side .
should they go back inside ? or keep exploring ?
output.sentences: Nature, void of humans, displays a beautiful day.
The sun glosses the rocks and the waters make music, running quickly forward.
The air collides with water tapping water, and the dark tunnel has wondered of the water's destination.
The humans are not out seeing the sun, they are inside exploring their minds, dispairingly.
While the animals stay within the bounds of nature, the sky has voted on serenity and beckons to the people.
